ArticleTitle.sentence: Multiple regulation involved in the expression of the uxuR regulatory gene in Escherichia coli K-12.

event.clue: Multiple regulation involved in the expression of the uxuR regulatory gene in Escherichia coli K-12.

AbstractText.sentence: We have isolated a strain carrying a fusion of the beta-galactosidase structural gene to the promoter of the uxuR regulatory gene with the aid of the Casadaban Mud (Aprlac) phage.

event.clue: We have isolated a strain carrying a fusion of the beta-galactosidase structural gene to the promoter of the uxuR regulatory gene with the aid of the Casadaban Mud (Aprlac) phage.

AbstractText.sentence: Analysis of mutants with deletions that were derived from the uxuR::Mud1 insertion strain confirmed the counterclockwise transcription direction of the uxuR gene.

AbstractText.sentence: It was observed that an increase in the copy number of the uxuR gene results in an increased repression of beta-galactosidase synthesis.

AbstractText.sentence: In all cases, the repression of beta-galactosidase synthesis was accompanied by a stronger repression of uxuB gene product synthesis.

AbstractText.sentence: These results indicate that the expression of the uxuR gene is repressed by its own product but also by the exuR repressor.

AbstractText.sentence: The different types of regulation of the two uxu operons are thus identical.
